node.statement: STRATEGY A4: CONVEXITY / OPTIMIZATION. Treat C as a function of v₃=(a,b)∈Cₚ² with w₁,w₂,α,β fixed. Analyze critical points. The ultrametric norm N is piecewise-linear on the Berkovich skeleton, so C is piecewise-multiplicative. Show minimum occurs at b=0 (collinear, cost=1) or at the boundary of parameter regions.
